Functions
LR_fnc_RunIntelAction
Description

Adapted version of the action part of BIS_fnc_initIntelObject to enable us to use LRG section names. Also, use remoteExec instead of the horrendously old BIS_fnc_MP.

Parameters
_object

The object to which the addAction was attached

_caller

The player that interacted with the addAction

_arguments

Array of arguments passed to the addAction

Return Values

None.

Examples
Author

Karel Moricky

Modified by: Mokka
